thread.title: The Siegfried Group, LLP Welcomes New Professionals From The West Region For New Hire Orientation
thread.title_full: The Siegfried Group, LLP Welcomes New Professionals From The West Region For New Hire Orientation

title: The Siegfried Group, LLP Welcomes New Professionals From The West Region For New Hire Orientation
text: The Siegfried Group, LLP Welcomes New Professionals From The West Region For New Hire Orientation By PR Newswire | 07/10/15 - 06:58 PM EDT Reprint WILMINGTON, Del. , July 10, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The Siegfried Group, LLP recently hosted new professionals from across the United States at the Four Seasons Hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada . The group learned more about the Firm's unique model, various departments and functions, and heard Robert L. Siegfried, Jr. , CPA, Chief Executive Officer and President, speak about the Firm's higher purpose. Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150710/235075 Siegfried's New Hire Orientation program is centered on introducing new professionals to the Firm's extraordinary culture. It is a great opportunity to meet members of Leadership, the Operations team and other fellow Professional Resources, while enjoying an exciting venue. The four-day program includes sessions on the Firm's structure, Siegfried's Client Service Delivery Model, Professional Resource expectations, as well as interactive presentations from all of the departments throughout the company. The orientation kicked off with a welcome reception at the Four Seasons' Swann Lounge, and throughout orientation, the group was able to enjoy dinners at some of the finest restaurants in Las Vegas including Jasmine at the Bellagio, Top of the World and Charlie Palmer's Steak. At the end of Orientation, the new professionals also had the chance to attend Siegfried's fifth MY Journey â„¢ event focused on the topic of building mastery in "Confidence". In the West Region, Siegfried is excited about Shireen Cheok and Shelley Gulati joining the Firm. Shireen Cheok , CPA Shireen is s a Certified Public Accountant who joins the Los Angeles Market as an Associate Director. Prior to joining the Firm, she spent four years with PWC's Transaction Services Group in New York. Shireen received her Bachelors of Business from the University of Monash in Australia. 1 of 3
